metadata.description: Reference catalog of all agents in the Vrooli swarm ecosystem

usage.description: This reference file contains metadata about all agents in the system
queries: Find all coordinator agents: jq '.byRole.coordinator' agent-reference.json
Search agents by name: jq '.agents[] | select(.name | test("pattern"; "i"))' agent-reference.json
List all subscription topics: jq '[.agents[].subscriptions[]] | unique' agent-reference.json
Count agents by role: jq '.byRole | to_entries | map({role: .key, count: (.value | length)})' agent-reference.json
